byline.contributor: Adam Dean and Saw Nang contributed reporting from Naypyidaw, Myanmar, and Eaint Thiri Thu from Yangon, Myanmar.

abstract: Profile of Myanmar poet and former political prisoner U Tin Thit, who unexpectedly beat former defense minister for seat in Parliament as part of landslide victory for party of Daw Aung San Suu Kyi.
lead_paragraph: Perhaps no election victory was more eloquent than that of U Tin Thit, a poet and former political prisoner who defeated a former defense minister.

headline.main: A Poet’s Election Victory Over a Former General Speaks of a New Myanmar
headline.print_headline: A Poet’s Election Victory Over a Former General Speaks of a New Myanmar

snippet: Perhaps no election victory was more eloquent than that of U Tin Thit, a poet and former political prisoner who defeated a former defense minister.
